summary: Yashwant Vithoba Chittal  was a leading Indian fiction writer.
full_text:
Yashwant Vithoba Chittal  was one of the leading Kannada fiction writers  and an Academy award recipient for his work Purushottama.
He was born in Hanehalli, Uttar Kannada District. He completed his primary school education from his village school and his high school from the Gibbs High School, Kumta .
